summary:
Senior executive in innovation, R&D and product development with over 17 years of experience with a leading Brazilian company with international operations and with the biggest global beer & beverage company. 
Multi-functional roles in different areas and projects, using a variety of innovation and management tools.
Proven experience of structuring new areas within the Innovation and R&D Departments. 
Great ability to establish rapport at all levels of the organization by interacting and managing multi-disciplinary teams. 
Project Management Experience reporting to the executive management board in both matrix and functional based models.
Combination of technical academic background and strong strategic vision, highly skilled in planning and implementing, with focus in results. 
Experience in creating and developing high performance teams. 
Native speaker in Portuguese, fluent in English and B2 level in Dutch, with international living experience in Brazil, Netherlands, Italy, USA, Canada and Belgium.
